text: Elizabeth Hanford Dole (born July 29, 1936) was a United States Senator. She was the Secretary of Transportation in Ronald Reagan's administration and the US Secretary of Labor for George H.W. Bush. She is the widow of former Senator Bob Dole, who ran for president but did not win. == References == Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States Secretaries of Labor Category:2000 United States presidential candidates Category:United States senators from North Carolina
title: Elizabeth Dole
